title: "Floor" means the lower surface in a storey on which one normally walks in a building, and does not include a mezzanine floor
clause_text: "Floor" means the lower surface in a storey on which one normally walks in a building, and does not include a mezzanine floor. The floor at ground level with a direct access to a street or open space shall be called the ground floor; the floor above it shall be termed as floor 1, with the next higher floor being termed as floor 2, and so on upwards.
